Activities.Description: The Underwater Sea Walk is one of the most unique attractions that ne must experience when visiting Mauritius. It is a true once in a life time experience for all the non divers out there! Experience the ultimate sensation where time stops, worries fade away and breathing underwater becomes possible, safe and easy.Enjoy a safe and fascinating underwater walk on the ocean bed (about 3-4m depth), and witness firsthand the magnificent marine life of Mauritius, the beautiful fauna, corals, and a wide variety of fish, all in their natural habitat. Qualified experienced guides will accompany you along the course of the Underwater Sea Walk guaranteeing your maximum safety. This is a wonderful experience and a great opportunity to discover the underwater world from within, and make your fantasies come true. Duration: 15mins Restrictions: Adult: 12yrs+ Child: 6yrs+

Activities.ShortDescription: The waterfall is absolutely magnificent and definitely worth visiting. We recommend you climb up to the upper observation platform to get a better view of the complete waterfall, which is not visible from the lower platform.
Activities.Description: The waterfall is absolutely magnificent and definitely worth visiting. We recommend you climb up to the upper observation platform to get a better view of the complete waterfall, which is not visible from the lower platform.

Dolphin Watch in Mauritius on a 2 hours trip with light Breakfast. The Mauritian West Coast is now worldwide known as a Sanctuary for Dolphins. The Bottle-nose or TursiopTruncatus can be seen in early morning playing and relaxing in small bays along our coast: Point Moyenne, Tamarin Bay or Black River Bay.

Full day catamaran cruise to Gabriel Island day full of sun, delicious food, drinks, beautiful beaches and a lot of relaxation and fun. (BBQ Lunch or Veg Foods & drinks Included) Restrictions: Adult: 12yrs+ Child: 6yrs+

You will enjoy an unforgettable excursion combining a great cruising experience on a luxury Catamaran and free time to enjoy the beautiful Gabriel Island. On Gabriel Island itself you will find sun beds and additional facilities, such as massage services, water activities and more.

The fleet comprises modern helicopters, each with a seating capacity of four (4) passengers. Experienced pilots who have been trained to meet the demanding safety standards of Air Mauritius also act as your personal guide, entertaining and informing you about Mauritius history, geography and sites of interest as you glide above fantastic landscapes.

Our experienced pilots are trained to the demanding safety standards of Air Mauritius. They also act as your personal guide, entertaining and informing you about Mauritius history, geography and sites of interest as you glide above fantastic landscapes.

Please note that all passengers boarding any AIR MAURITIUS Helicopter flight ( sight-seeing, transfer etc) need to produce proof of identity e.g. passport, drivers licence etc

Dramatic views of the ocean to the south and Blue Bay Maritime Reserve to the east ensure that Ile Des DeuxCocos has everything you could possibly ask for from a deserted private island. Built over a century ago by flamboyant British Governor Sir Hesketh Bell, the island's villa has a distinctly eccentric charm, blending European and Moorish architectural styles with a traditionally Mauritian-inspired interior that's both enchanting and entirely novel.
Surrounded by a large lagoon and a unique barrier reef, it provides Scuba Diving in the most beautiful Coral Gardens for lovers of Recreational Diving and scenic colorful environment.

Dolphin Watch in Mauritius on a 2 hours trip with light Breakfast. The Mauritian West Coast is now worldwide known as a Sanctuary for Dolphins. The Bottle-nose or TursiopTruncatus can be seen in early morning playing and relaxing in small bays along our coast: Point Moyenne, Tamarin Bay or Black River Bay.

Road trippers fasten your seat belts and get ready for an amazing moment on the off-road tracks in the fields with full sensations of a Polaris ride like never before. This fun and speedy ride will overwhelm you, as you get to discover the incredible countryside of the northern part of Mauritius. You will have the chance to ride along the wild nature, vast area of sugar cane fields, rocky and dusty terrains and also along the humid tropical forest.

Restrictions: Driver Height: 1m50+ Age: 15yrs+ Max: 4pax

Ziplines deliver an adrenaline rush that the adventurous types appreciate. Our zipline is the longest in Mauritius and there is nothing quite like this thrill to shake you out of your daily routine You will also be brought to walk on the Nepalese Bridge and have a rapid perspective on the beautiful surroundings. Further push your limits by experiencing double and triple ziplines and, just before lunch time, continue on with the mini ziplines that will land you in a splash right in the water below.

Additional Notes Minimum age: 8 years old Max Weight 100 kgs This activity is ideal for birthday parties or for a day of motivation Schedule The Full: 9h30 to 15h30 approximately Booking Essential Note that all participants need to be physically and mentally competent in order to participate in those activities.

For true fans, get up-close and personal with the lion king through an encounter of a unique kind. Get your picture taken while you give the beast a pat and feel the sudden surge of emotions! Thanks to the professional team of supervisors, you never walk alone Interactions last approximately 10 to 15 minutes inside the enclosure. Depending on availability.

Participants must be at least 15 years old and 1m50 tall?,Participants must be physically and mentally able to perform this particular activity?- All participants must understand English or French, so they can follow the instructions of our guides while dealing with the animals. This is very important for the safety of this activity.

If you have always wondered how giraffe really look like and how they live, make haste to our Safari Platform to see the tallest animal on the planet. Casela World of Adventures is home to a whopping nine giraffe. Come befriend Tagada, Bella, Khakoo, Caramel, TiPima, Mikemba, Kira, Malaika and Queen as they grow up to reach their adult height. If you feel like getting more intimate, simply come and they will all be delighted to enjoy some food from the palm of your hand. They are also very keen to pose for selfies! Duration: 10 minutes Schedule: 10h00, 11h30, 13h00, 15h30

Note: 10 mints

Experience the fun of having our colourful lorikeets resting on your hands or shoulder to drink a fruit nectar. Additional Information The activity is available 3 times a day: 10h30 13h30 15h30 As from 5 years old Note: 5-10 mints Age: 5Yrs+ Max 3 pax per slot

Our horses take you to the heart of our safari for unique and memorable encounters with our African animals. Our professional staff is here to accompany you throughout this fun activity. Take some time of to discover what nature has to offer best, at your own pace.
